select sci.id, sci.course_date, sci.start_time, sci.end_time, sci.class_id, sci.course_id, cai.name as className, ci.name as courseName, ci.address, ci.duration, ci.people_num, ci.credit, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from schedule_class_info sci left join class_info cai on (cai.id = sci.class_id) left join course_info ci on (ci.id = sci.course_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) where 1 = 1
AND cai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleClassInfo.className},'%')
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleClassInfo.courseName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleClassInfo.majorName},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleClassInfo.staffName},'%')
AND ci.id = #{scheduleClassInfo.classId}
AND si.user_id = #{scheduleClassInfo.staffId}
order by sci.course_date desc
